select sum(if(type = 'purchase',a.transaction_amount,0 ) ) purchaseAmount, sum(if(type = 'redemption',a.transaction_amount,0 ) ) redemptionAmount, a.coin from fund_transaction_record a left join wallet_agent_product b on a.product_id = b.product_id
and a.status = 1 group by coin

select a.id, a.uid, a.fund_id as fundId, a.product_id as productId, a.product_name as productName, c.product_name_en as productNameEn, a.coin, c.rate, a.transaction_amount as transactionAmount, a.type, a.status, a.create_time as createTime from wallet_agent_product b inner join fund_transaction_record a on a.product_id = b.product_id inner join fund_record c on a.fund_id = c.id
order by a.create_time desc
select count(*) from fund_transaction_record a left join wallet_agent_product b on a.product_id = b.product_id where b.agent_id = #{agentId} and a.status = 3
